subject: Fwd: Issue with Pro Plus Pedals
description_text:
Reminder, my inquiry is unanswered till now.


---------- Weitergeleitete Nachricht ----------
Von: ahellmich@gmx.net
Datum: 7. Juli 2025, 22:48 +0200
An: service@simsonn.com
Betreff: Issue with Pro Plus Pedals

> Hello,
>
> I have a serious issue with my recently purchased Pro Plus pedals. Today the second  time the hydraulic damper of the throttle got out of it‘s lower mounting. First time I fixed it by myself, but obviously there is a recurring problem.
>
> Respective order no is #SSN1898.
>
> Best regards
> Andreas

conversations.body_text: Hi Ahellmich,  Please provide a few clear photos so we can confirm the issue. Thank you for your cooperation!

As you can see, the rod has slipped out of its mount. Trying to reattach it doesn't help, as the thread apparently can no longer hold the rod.

Regards
Andreas
Am 10. Juli 2025, 12:57 +0200 schrieb service@simsonn.com

Hi Ahellmich,    We will send you a new one-way hydraulic rod today. Before the new rod arrives, you can remove the current one, hold the rod with pliers, and manually tighten the white cap on the other end
